TITLE: Episode 110 - Reed Coverdale Mansplains the Dumbing Down of Society
DESCRIPTION: Reed Coverdale of the Naturalist Capitalist podcast joins the Vixens to mansplain why the world seems dumber than s#!t these days, and why it’s probably a good time to get some blue-collar-skilled friends (if that’s not already your collar) and develop your apocalypse trades now.
